name: The Green Ball (In development)
description:
This is an early version of a platform game that I work on from time to time, it has 3 very simple and short levels, I would love to get feedback so feel free to do so because I feel like I'm stuck and the game is missing things. (It still has many bugs)

I hope you enjoy this "game" :)

Credits:

Sprites: Kenney, pzUH, Gdevelop

Fonts: HappyMonkey-Regular by Brenda Gallo (CC0), Hansen Shadow by Dieter Steffmann  (CC0)

Music:  

 Fast Feel Banana Peel by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
